This is a nationwide attempt to create Awareness on Water and Sanitation, Environment, Healthy Active Living.This initiative has been taken to reach out to government school going children by providing the following five components in government schools:
 a. Improved Access to Water
 b. Water Conservation by providing Rain Water Harvesting Structures
 c. Hygiene and Sanitation by providing toilet facilities for girls and boys
 d. Environment by providing Plantation and landscaping
 e. Healthy Active Living by providing Sports facilities like basketball court/ volley ball/ sports kits.
This initiative is supported by Sachin Tendulkar, the campaign ambassador. The campaign focuses on promoting the cause of health and sanitation along with the need to encourage sports in schools and raise funds to help solve these problems on a sustainable basis.
Tathva '11 is taking up 'Support My School' as one of its social initiatives in association with NDTV and Coca-Cola, to help them achieve this goal.
